name: Frontend Performance Patterns
title: Frontend Performance Patterns
description: Performance optimization patterns including Core Web Vitals (LCP, FID, CLS), code splitting, tree shaking, lazy loading, image/font optimization, caching strategies (ISR, SWR), bundle analysis, React profiler, and Lighthouse automation

axiomAlignment.A1_verifiability: Core Web Vitals and Lighthouse provide measurable performance verification
axiomAlignment.A2_user_primacy: Optimizations prioritize user-perceived speed and responsive interaction
axiomAlignment.A3_transparency: Bundle analysis and metrics expose performance tradeoffs clearly
axiomAlignment.A4_non_harm: Performance patterns avoid degrading accessibility or user experience
axiomAlignment.A5_consistency: Unified optimization approach across LCP, FID, CLS, and bundle strategies
